

.. _sphx_glr_tutorial_getting_started.py:


Getting started
---------------

This is a sample tutorial page.


Start by importing stuff.



.. code-block:: python


    import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
    import numpy as np








Create some random data.



.. code-block:: python


    x = np.linspace(0, 100, 100)
    y = np.sin(x) + 10
    print(x, y)





.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-script-out

Make the plot.



.. code-block:: python


    plt.figure()
    plt.plot(x, y)
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()



.. image:: /tutorial/images/sphx_glr_getting_started_001.png
    :align: center




**Total running time of the script:** ( 0 minutes  0.206 seconds)
